messages.title: Our A&E and Women & Children's Centre is at risk
messages.content: Kuldip has been a leading member of the campaign to protect the A&E and Women & Children's Unit. This Centre opened a year ago at a cost of £28million and the A&E at the PRH is the busiest in Shropshire - yet they are at risk of closure.

messages.title: Telford's Choice
messages.content: Send a message to the Tories, Telford will not accept the downgrade of our Hospital. KULDIP SAHOTA IS PROUD TO BE TELFORD'S LABOUR CANDIDATE. Kuldip is very proud to have received the nomination to stand as the Parliamentary Candidate for Telford. He has called home to Telford. As a former Leader of Telford & Wrekin Council, Kuldip has a proven record of promoting Telford's interests for the town's good.

messages.title: Kuldip's contract with Telford
messages.content: I will be a full-time MP - with no other jobs and live in Telford. I will ring fence 10% of my Salary for good causes in Telford. I will stand up for Telford without fear or favour. I will hold regular surgeries. I will work with the Labour Council to get jobs and investment. I will be a full-time office in Telford to help constituents with issues. I will bring National represent to everybody household in Telford. I will offer Telford a fresh start - working for every community.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Kuldip has been a leading member of the campaign to protect the A&E and Women & Children's Unit. He will fight tooth and nail to protect these services.
Kuldip supports retaining local businesses and job creation, including the regeneration of the Donnington MOD base and local manufacturing at GKN Sankey's.
Labor has a proven track record of delivery for our town, and Kuldip will work to promote Telford's interest and the town's regeneration.
